idea-plugin.name: Odoo Autocomplete Plugin
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin enhances PyCharm/IntelliJ IDEA with advanced autocompletion and navigation features for Odoo development.

Core Features:

  • Search Everywhere: Instantly find Odoo modules, models, and records.
  • Model Hierarchy: View Odoo model inheritance in the type hierarchy view.
  • Python Imports: Autocomplete and resolve odoo.addons.* imports.
  • Model Names: Autocomplete model names in _name, _inherit, and relational fields (Many2one, etc.).
  • Record IDs: Autocomplete record IDs from XML and CSV files.
  • JS Modules: Autocomplete and navigate to JavaScript modules defined with odoo.define.
  • PO/POT Files: Autocomplete and navigate to msgid entries from translation files.
  • Navigation: Go To Declaration support for models, records, JS modules, and PO `msgid`s.

The plugin is designed for performance and integrates smoothly into the IDE, providing a seamless experience for Odoo developers across all supported versions.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
